meanings.definition: To be in a state of fear or panic.
meanings.sent1: She funkeds whenever she hears thunder.
meanings.sent2: The child funked when he saw a spider.
meanings.sent3: The puppy funkeds at the sight of a vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The student funkeds like a scared rabbit during the horror movie.
meanings.sent5: The dark alley made him funked with terror.

meanings.definition: To avoid or back out of a situation due to fear or anxiety.
meanings.sent1: He funkeds out of the haunted house tour.
meanings.sent2: She funkeds from giving a speech in front of the class.
meanings.sent3: The cat funkeds out of taking a bath by hiding under the bed.
meanings.sent4: The athlete funkeds away from the challenging obstacle course.
meanings.sent5: The shy boy funkeds out of joining the dance competition.
